com.netflix.genie.server.jobmanager

Interface JobManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    HadoopJobManager, HiveJobManager, PigJobManager

    public interface JobManager
    The interface to be implemented by Hadoop, Hive and Pig job manager implementations.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void kill(JobInfoElement ji)
      Kill a job using the job information - no need to initialize this job.
      void launch(JobInfoElement ji)
      Initialize, and launch the job once it has been initialized.

    • Method Detail

      • launch

        void launch(JobInfoElement ji)
            throws CloudServiceException
        Initialize, and launch the job once it has been initialized.
        Parameters:
        ji - the JobInfo object for the job to be launched
        Throws:
        CloudServiceException

      • kill

        void kill(JobInfoElement ji)
          throws CloudServiceException
        Kill a job using the job information - no need to initialize this job.
        Parameters:
        ji - the JobInfo object for the job to be killed
        Throws:
        CloudServiceException
